reviewText: Very entertaining and educational. My kids love it!! They want to see it over and over and over. worth it
I ordered this product for my child for christmas, not only did it arrive before the expected time, but also was in mint condition. Thank you!

These videos are so entertaining and I find myself watching along. They provide hours of fun and happiness to my 2 year old granddaughter and I love watching her do the clock rug stretch with Loonette. There are many good ways to learn with these Comfy couch videos and I will be back again and again....

My daughter loves to watch all of the big comfy couch shows every day.  She is excited about going to school and this gives her just enough courage to want to go.  I love Loonette and Molly and how they're always so positive.
